security: This document contains personal information about employees of the Select Committee on Assassinations, including their names, social security numbers, positions, and salaries. Disclosing this information could violate their privacy.
summary: This document is a payroll certification report for the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations, detailing employee names, social security numbers, positions, salaries, and periods of employment for January 1979 and November 1976.
summary_one_paragraph: This is a payroll certification report from the U.S. House of Representatives Select Committee on Assassinations for the accounting periods of January 1979 and November 1976. It lists employee names, social security numbers, job titles, annual salaries, period pay, and remarks regarding appointments or terminations. The report includes an office payroll summary with the number of employees paid, salary expenditures, and certifications confirming employees performed their duties and have no prohibited relationships with current members of Congress.
title: Certification Report for Select Committee on Assassinations
sender: Chairman Louis Stokes; Clerk of the House; Chairman, House Administration Committee
